name: sbr-generator
description: Spring Boot Rest Generator is a  python Library used to generate source code modules starting from config files . The Generated source code is a CRUD Rest Spring Boot Server.

scripts.testFullBuildNoTests: npm run buildExampleFullNoTests && cd buildExampleFullNoTests && mvn package install -Dmaven.test.skip=true
scripts.testMinBuildNoTests: npm run buildExampleMinNoTests && cd buildExampleMinNoTests && mvn package install -Dmaven.test.skip=true
scripts.testMinBuildAndDoTests: npm run buildExampleMin && cd buildExampleMin && mvn test
scripts.testFullBuildAndDoTests: npm run buildExampleFull && cd buildExampleFull && mvn test
scripts.test: npm run buildTemplates && npm run testFullBuildNoTests && npm run testMinBuildNoTests && npm run testMinBuildAndDoTests && npm run testFullBuildAndDoTests

author: Mohamed Azzouni <mohamed.azzouni@gmail.com>
